s: Hi guys and thanks for all of the questions about Blaster Boards. Back in 2014, I designed a product called Fort Boards (fort building kits). Since then I’ve been getting lots of people telling me how they’ve been using Fort Boards to make battle bunkers for their Nerf wars. Because of that interest, I decided to launch a new brand ...
